## HydrationContextOptions.extraScriptProps property

Props that will be passed down to `script` tags that will be used to transport data to the browser. Can e.g. be used to add a `nonce`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
extraScriptProps?: ScriptProps;
```
